Keywords: Atlantis , Avengers , Cabal , Dark X-Men , Defenders , Illuminati , Invaders , Ruler , Utopia
Real Name: Namor McKenzie
Special Powers
AVENGING SON: Wing symbol, Flurry. Charge, but do not halve speed.
AQUATIC REJUVENATION: Invulnerability, Regeneration. When Namor occupies water terrain, he can use Regeneration as FREE.
ALL OF THE OCEAN'S CREATURES BOW TO THE WILL OF THE KING OF ATLANTIS: Leadership. // POWER: Generate a standard character from your Sideline of 50pts or less that has the Dolphin symbol. This effect can only be used twice per game.
